article_title: An Important Fix To America's Food Stamp Crisis

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Even as the economy has started to improve, millions of able-bodied childless Americans have become trapped in the food stamp program. Yet governors and legislators can make a simple policy change this summer to reinstate work requirements that will help to restore the working class.
og.title: Restoring Work Requirements: An Important Fix To America's Food Stamp Crisis
